Description: Bronze weight, once filled with lead, in the form of a goat. It is marked with six digits.
Curator's comments: Aruz, J., Benzel, K., and Evans, J. M., 2008. Beyond Babylon: art, trade, and diplomacy in the second millennium B.C., pg 369-371
Bibliographic references: Bronze / Catalogue of the Bronzes in the British Museum. Greek, Roman & Etruscan. (42)
